introduction.content: Hello, hello! To whoever is reading this, I hope you're having a wonderful day. Thanks for taking the time to check my website out.

main.content: I'm currently a 4th year student studying Computer Science at the University of Waterloo. In my most recent (also final) internship with Extend, I worked as a backend developer on their virtual card platform. In this internship, I built an entire service that manages screening virtual card users. Crazy, right?

hobbies.content: But that's not all there is to me. When I'm not building crazy things with brilliant people, I'm probably gaming. Genshin Impact has truly been a gift sent from above. I also really enjoy playing basketball and badminton whenever the crew is available ðŸ˜Ž.

conclusion.content: Thanks for reading! If you've found me interesting enough and want to chat with me, feel free to connect on LinkedIn, linked below along with my GitHub.
